transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji Naveen ji baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Naveen ji namaskar Rahul baat kar raha tha kal aapne call kiya tha na from IndiaMART se.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahiye. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello ha ji sir ha ji sir namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar Naveen ji kaise hai abhi matlab office pahunche hai ki bahar hai abhi?
Executive: Ha ji main office to nahi pahuncha bahar hi hu bataiye.
Customer: Ha kal call kiya tha na buylead ko leke bola kal ek baar mujhe call karna main us time pe matlab raste me tha iska.
Executive: Aap side pe hi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi main to office aa jaunga office me hu.
Executive: Ha pichla teen char din se dekhiyega lead ekdam do teen do teen hi chal rahi hai sir.
Customer: Ha main aapko bata diya bulk ka filter lagao sir 130 pack ki abhi bhi aa rakhi hai ek do lead man sakta hu ki aapke relevant nahi hai par bulk ka filter lagaoge na to valid available hai aur sir ko bhi maine dikhaya tha buylead sold out bhi ho rahi thi usko jo bulk wali hai na jaise 200 bottle ki requirement thi.
Customer: Sold out to wo hoti hai na jo 32 lead humko milti hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi jaise aap dekho koi buylead pe aapne connect nahi kiya hai theek hai to matlab within second kisi bhi achi buylead hai kisi aur supplier ne usme connect kiya tab wo sold out hoti hai wo. Maine bola tha ki thoda sold out wale pe aap mark interested kar dena kyuki achi achi quality wali buylead sold out bhi aapki hui thi portal me se.
Customer: Wo to hum karte rehte hai lekin main ye janna chahta hu pichle teen char din se kam kyu ho gayi hai.
Executive: Teen char din se lead to aa hi rahi hai ho sakta hai ki retail ki requirement jyada aa rahi hongi us time pe to waise buylead ko consume mat karo bahut sare shortlisted bhi karke rakha hai inhone aur bulk ka filter.
Customer: Aur hume direct call bhi aati thi call bhi nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aap dekhna pichle pichle char din ka nikal ke dekho aapke samne result aa jayega aapke pure November me 131 call aayi hai jisme 76% answers call hai.
Customer: November mujhe pichle char din ka batao ji kitni lead aayi hai aur pichle uske aath din ka bata do aapko andaza lag jayega ki lead kaha kam aayi.
Executive: Naveen ji dekho abhi main lead agar dekho to abhi GH pain and powder ki aa rakhi hai 130 pack ki quantity ki hai aur 12 ghante pehle orthonil powder ki hai sir Ahmedabad Gujarat ki hai theek hai ayurvedic joint powder ki hai.
Customer: Dekho main ye nahi keh raha hu sir ji ki lead aa nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Aap motivation nahi pakad rahe main cheez pe mudda nahi hai ki do teen din se buylead thodi kam aa rahi hai kharab aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Ha main wahi dekh raha hu to usme dekho jo batata hu Naveen ji meri baat suno jo buylead irrelevant lage na pehle to system AI based hai apna hai to usko not relevant mark kar dena agar lag rahi hai buylead mere kam ki nahi hai product related nahi hai jo kharab buylead aa rahi hai to agar jo kyuki keyword mismatch hota hai uske karan buylead wo aati hai waha pe aap agar not relevant kar doge na to buylead aana band ho jayegi us category ki aur block bhi kar doge us category ko to nahi aani hogi do teen din ka man sakta hu ki kharab agar aayi hai to usme working and not element usko mark kar dena.
Customer: Ha thoda dekhiyega sir iski kya gadbad hua hai thoda apne end pe dekh lijiyega.
Executive: Jarur definitely sir mera number hai na personal wala maine to aapko mera number jo mera personal number hai aapke number pe call bhi karunga main office pahunchunga abhi ek dedh ghante me main aapke sath fir dobara baat karunga sir ek baar.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Kitne der me pahunchoge office?
Customer: Ek dedh ghanta lag jayega.
Executive: Ek dedh ghanta main ek dedh ghante me call karu aapko ek baar fir.
Executive: Aap call nahi karoge tab bhi meri call aa jayegi kyuki website pe gadbad chal rahi hai.
Customer: Chalo main call kar lunga abhi 9:40 ho raha hai 10:30 se kar lu?
Executive: 11 baje ke baad baat kariyega sir.
Customer: Chalo theek hai koi baat nahi aap agar kahi busy hai to apna time bata do main us hisab se nahi nahi main abhi to baitha hu nahi nahi nahi aap bol do koi dikkat nahi hai main baitha hu abhi bhi 10:30 baje bol rahe koi baat nahi hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Decrease in buyleads in the last 3-4 days.

- Direct calls are not being received.



Resolution:

- Advised to use bulk filters for relevant buyleads.

- Suggested marking irrelevant buyleads as 'not relevant'.

- Executive will check for any issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer after reaching office.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filters, website
